评论概述: A unique, adorable, must-have small backpack purse with custom embroidery!
评论详情: I love everything about this beautiful bag. It’s made of soft canvas/cotton and velvet with an embroidered design. I ordered it in Mulberry leaf grass. The colors are tones of beige, white, blue, and black. The silver zipper pulls are a teardrop shape with a cut-out of a leaf.  The front flap has a 3-D embroidery design and a magnetic snap closure. The interior is lined with tan/white herringbone nylon fabric and has a floating zipper pocket, an open pocket, and a side zipper pocket. While on the small side, there’s room for a tablet, eReader, cell phone, wallet, keys, notepad, tissue pack, sunglasses, and a few other items.  There’s a zipper pouch on the front for things you need easy access to.  Both sides have velour slip pockets for a water bottle or compact umbrella. The back of the pack has an anti-theft zipper pocket to protect your valuables.  To carry the bag, you can use the cute braided loop at the top to grab-and-go, or the convertible strap on the back. The strap has a zipper which allows you to zip it open to create two backpack straps. Or zip it closed and clip both straps to one d-loop and wear it over the shoulder or crossbody.  This is the cutest mini backpack purse I’ve seen and I can’t wait to show it off!
I Judy got this bag and Im enjoying, is just what I was need it

I ordered the backpack with the bunny on it. It is SO CUTE! I love the beads on it and the extra details that create a 3D effect. It feels very well-made, with a hefty fabric and sturdy stitching. The inside is roomier than I expected, with a few pockets for organization. My only complaint is that some of the beads are not stitched on very tightly and I worry that without reinforcement, they will fall off. Otherwise, I am so excited to carry it around and make use of it. So cute!
Love it, it’s so unique. I’ve gotten stopped and questioned about it several times a day

评论概述: Lots of space and super cute design but…

I will be using fabric glue to keep the girls hand in place as well as the green knit flower she is holding because it jumbles up and looks like a ball instead of a flower. I will Also attempt to glue the part of the magnetic closure back on. Hope it stays.  I’ll upload pictures.

This bag is so freaking cute!! And such good quality! The pouches are velvet, and I’m obsessed with the crochet mushrooms! Not a super big bag, but I’m planning to use it as a purse so I don’t mind. Go buy this bag right now!
